alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Powell, southeastern Montgomery, west central Morgan, south central Bath, eastern Estill, Menifee and northwestern Wolfe Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lombard, or near Stanton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Haystack, Koomer Ridge Campground, Jenson and Pine Ridge around 525 PM EDT. Campsites in the Indian Creek area of the Daniel Boone National Forrest, Red River Gorge, Tabor, Fagan, Rothwell and Cornwell around 530 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Frenchburg, Mariba, Denniston, Pomeroyton, Stoll, Valeria, Wellington, Ezel, Ratlitt and Maytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe
